Variable Detail

$application

Data type: application
Reference to application that uses this instance.
  • Access - public

$highlight

Data type: array
Positions and colors of records to highlight. 
The array contains
 HTML colors keyed by context cursor id.
  • See - cursor::id()
  • Access - public

$no_update

Data type: array
Don't generate a form in next open_source.
  • Access - public

$raw_views

Data type: array
Array of event handlers that open a document header or footer on their own. 
The handler names are stores in the keys - the values can
 contain anything (preferably a boolean).
  • Access - public

$record_cache

Data type: array
Cached cursor values. 
The array contains the keyed by context cursor id.
  • See - val()
  • Access - public

$v

Data type: _admin_panel_view
Reference to current context object.

$widgets

Data type: widget_set
Reference to widget set.
  • Access - public

$_anchor

Data type: boolean
Use anchors in links when set to 'true'.

$_anchors

Data type: boolean
Number of set anchors.

$_form_index

Data type: integer
Index of last form. 
The first form has index 1.

$_opencells

Data type: integer
Number of open cells.

$_openform

Data type: integer
Number of opened forms.

$_openrow

Data type: integer
Number of open rows.

$_opentable

Data type: integer
Number of open tables.

$_viewstack

Data type: array
Context stack.
  • See - admin_panel::open_context(), admin_panel::close_context()

void confirm ( $msg, $option_yes, $event_yes, $option_no, $event_no, [$color = 0] )

Print confirmation box.
Function Parameters:
- string $msg: Question to the user.
- string $option_yes: Label for confirming option.
- object $event_yes: event Event to trigger for confirming option.
- string $option_no: Label for non-confirming option.
- object $event_no: event Event to trigger for non-confirming option.
- string $color: Color for question in HTML attribute format.

select_id

void select_id ( $field, $source, $column, $id, [$where = ''] )

Select an entry in a foureign table and store its primary key.
Function Parameters:
- string $field:
- string $source: Name of foureign table.
- string $column: Name of column in foureign table that is printed.
- string $id: Name of the primary key column.
- string $where: WHERE clause to use to select the records from the foureign table (without WHERE keyword).
Function Info:
Access - public

void use_anchor ( )
